
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a string having an uppercase first character.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is a string with an uppercase first
        character.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( 'Hello' )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( 'world' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
